activity_differential: child and adult walking together with toy gun box
description: A busy urban sidewalk scene outside a building with a red SUV parked. Multiple people, including a child and an adult carrying a toy gun box, walk past. Two workers in green vests are shoveling snow near a fence. The camera tracks the scene, panning as people move through the frame.
